title: This Maldives Resort Is Putting on a Holiday Celebration Inspired by ‘Atlantis: The Lost Kingdom’
summary: The InterContinental Maldives Maamunagau Resort is trading tinsel for tridents this December, unveiling an ambitious holiday program inspired by the myth of “Atlantis: The Lost Kingdom.” The Indian Ocean property, already known for its overwater villas and cinematic sunsets, is transforming into an…
